data: Speaking of money—and it’s a mighty popular topic—the investment of the first twenty-five cents I ever earned, all at a crack, ought to have directed my feet, my thoughts, and my future along the straight and narrow way.

SPEAKING of money--and it’s a mighty popular topic--the investment of the first twenty-five cents I ever earned, all at a crack, ought to have directed my feet, my thoughts, and my future along the straight and narrow way.

Where Your Treasure Is: Being the Personal Narrative of Ross Sidney, Diver
